info.author: Guangming Li
info.description:
What is PyPngnq?
===========================================

    PyPngnq is a tool for quantizing PNG images in RGBA format

Installation
===========================================

    You need to install libpng first, To install PyPngnq:

    Debian::

        apt-get install libpng-dev -y

    FreeBSD::

        cd /usr/ports/graphics/png
        make install clean

    To install PyPngnq::

        pip install PyPngnq

How to use it?
========================

    Following is a simple example::

        # -*- coding: utf8 -*-
        from pypngnq import PngNQ
        nq = PngNQ('/tmp/test.png')
        #print nq.config
        nq.use_floyd = False
        nq.save('/tmp/test_pypngnq.png')
        nq.close()
info.name: pypngnq
info.summary: a utility for optimizing PNG files
info.html_description:
What is PyPngnq?

PyPngnq is a tool for quantizing PNG images in RGBA format

Installation

You need to install libpng first, To install PyPngnq:

Debian:

apt-get install libpng-dev -y

FreeBSD:

cd /usr/ports/graphics/png
make install clean

To install PyPngnq:

pip install PyPngnq

How to use it?

Following is a simple example:

# -*- coding: utf8 -*-
from pypngnq import PngNQ
nq = PngNQ('/tmp/test.png')
#print nq.config
nq.use_floyd = False
nq.save('/tmp/test_pypngnq.png')
nq.close()
